message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product I think you'd be very interested in. I'm offering it to you for $10000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else. What do you say?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $8000 is a good price, I'm still looking for a bit more to make this deal work. I'm willing to come down to $9000, but that's my final offer. If you're not interested at that price, I'll have to move on to other interested buyers.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $7500?
